- The association between wheelchair users and physically disabled folks implies that these individuals may be part of the conversation due to their shared experiences with disability.

Step 3: Compare both options based on the evidence found in Step 2. The other option (The man with the wheelchair) has several pieces of evidence supporting it, such as people perceiving those who use wheelchairs negatively or associating them with physically disabled folks.
